title: october 14: a Nobel prize for a Noble man
description:
You may know this man from his famous speech ‘I have a dream’ or his many contributions to human rights, but did you know that he received a Nobel Peace Prize? That's right! Martin Luther King Jr. not only received the Nobel Peace Prize but set history with being the youngest man and second Black man to receive the Nobel. In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia will share why MLK received this great honor and as well refresh us on some history of why King is so important to society today. Speaking of important individuals in society, Frank Sinatra may come to some minds as being an inspiration to music today. But did you know that he was part of the mafia?! Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
